Dear all,

After using Heritrix for 2 weeks, mainly crawling with a few URI for
testing purpose. I wondering how to run it for bigger scope.

Imagine i will like to craw a country, can a single heritrix machine
handle it? And how long it might take to finish the craw job?

Is there anyway that we can setup a "cluster" for heritrix, say using
5 pcs. So that a single craw job will distributed evenly to all
machines in the cluster for some kind of crawl balancing.  If not, how
can we expand heritrix for a huge crawl like this?

Thank you.
